body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia               Photographing at Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore   Looking for more photos of Indiana Dunes? Try our searchable Flickr account with over 3,000 images of scenic places, wildlife, events, activities, documentary, and architecture. You can search, browse, and download the image resolution that best suits your needs.
title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Photos & Multimedia
